name: Crunch Culture
description:
Game tycoon about factory production where you have to make the most of your workers, optimizing your income during the weeks, try to avoid bankruptcy doing your best to become a true self made man by the all powerful invisible hand.

Programers:

  • Luis Javier Sánchez Sánchez
  • Santiago Moreno Díaz

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Deliberate Thought" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
